sentences.en: Actually many famous movie stars begin with tiny and penniless walk - on.
sentences.cn: 事实上许多著名的影星就是从身无分文的不起眼的跑龙套的开始的.

sentences.en: Food was provided for penniless but hungry travelers at the two or three daily feed - ins.
sentences.cn: 每天举行两三次施舍,为身无分文的饥饿行人供应食物.

sentences.en: He lived well, helping the poor, and all other people; he died penniless and unknown.
sentences.cn: 他生前讲道德, 总是帮助穷人以及所有的人; 后来却一文不名,默默无闻地死了.

sentences.en: He was in a sad plight , sick and penniless.
sentences.cn: 他贫病交加, 处境十分困难.

sentences.en: In your house penniless, close to have again why to use?
sentences.cn: 你屋里一无所有, 关门又有何用?

sentences.en: Jobless and penniless , he had to sleep rough in the fields for several months.
sentences.cn: 他既无工作又无钱,只好在野外露宿数月.

sentences.en: Penniless, he begins to write, which is to earn him a living.
sentences.cn: 他一文不名, 开始以写作为生.

sentences.en: The day - coach -- he was penniless now -- was hot.
sentences.cn: 三等车里很热 —— 他现在一文不 剩 了.

sentences.en: The debt - collectors took all his money, and he was left completely penniless.
sentences.cn: 收债人拿走了他所有的钱, 他身无分文了.

sentences.en: The legal dispute left them penniless.
sentences.cn: 这场法律纠纷使他们一贫如洗.

sentences.en: The penniless author successfully wooed and married Fanny.
sentences.cn: 这位一文不名的作家向范妮求爱成功，和她结了婚。

sentences.en: The penniless man had to bum a ride home.
sentences.cn: 那个身无分文的人只好乞求搭车回家.

sentences.en: They'd soon be penniless and homeless if she couldn't find suitable work.
sentences.cn: 她要找不到合适的工作，他们很快就会身无分文，无家可归。

sentences.en: Uncle Charlie was jobless and penniless.
sentences.cn: 查理叔叔没有工作，一贫如洗。

trans.tran_cn: 一文不名的，贫穷的，不名一文，莫名一文
trans.tran_en: someone who is penniless has no money
